#summary Remove a contact as a friend

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
|| *Required* || *Name* || *Type || *Description* ||
|| required || jabberId || jid || Jabber ID of the user removing a contact from their TokBox contact list.||
|| || remoteJabberId || jid || Jabber ID of the user being removed from the contact list of the removing user. ||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
|| *Code* || *Exception* || *Description* ||
|| -1 || INVALID_USERID || Contact [id: ####] does not exist. ||
|| 401 || UnauthorizedUserException || You are not authorized to make requests as userid ###. Authorized as ####. ||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <removeContact jabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" remoteJabberId="######">
          <contact id="######">
               <removed>true</removed>
          </contact>
     </removeContact>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/contacts/remove</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="####"/>
     <timer startTime="1222156810.6945" execTime="366.70207977295"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * Jabber ID must be the user who is authorized to make the API call.
